about_the_game:
Trapped in an apartment that twists with every passing moment, you search for answers about your missing sister. But the deeper you explore, the more the walls seem to remember, and the shadows grow restless. Perpetuo is a first-person psychological horror game that thrusts you into an unsettling loop of guilt, regret, and hidden truths.

Explore every corner of the apartment, solve cryptic puzzles, and piece together fragments of a fractured story. As the environment decays and evolves, a sinister presence stalks you, growing stronger with each loop. Will you confront the truth and escape, or will the cycle consume you?

What to Expect:

  • A Shifting Nightmare: The apartment changes with each loop, revealing new horrors and secrets.

  • Immersive Storytelling: Discover a haunting narrative through exploration and subtle environmental clues.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Every solution brings you closer to the truth—or deeper into the nightmare.

  • Unrelenting Tension: A lurking entity grows more unpredictable as you inch toward uncovering the past.

  • A Concise Horror Experience: Perfectly crafted for fans of psychological terror and narrative-driven gameplay.


Face the cycle. Break the loop. Or remain in it forever... in... Perpetuo.

content_descriptors.notes: The game uses horror themes, as such, can offer disturbing images of dead bodies and blood.
